title: Apple Pie
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). 2. In a bowl, mix the flour and butter until crumbly. 3. Add the sugar and cinnamon, and mix well. 4. Arrange the apple slices in a pie dish and cover with the flour mixture. 5. Bake for 45 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown. 6. Let the pie cool before serving.
